Students, you are safe only as, in perfect submission and obedience, you connect yourselves with Christ. The yoke is easy, for Christ carries the weight. As you lift the burden of the cross, it will become light; and that cross is to you a pledge of eternal life. It is the privilege of each to follow gladly after Christ, exclaiming at every step, "Thy gentleness hath made me great" (2 Samuel 22:36). But if we would travel heavenward, we must take the Word of 
                                                                           243
God as our lesson book. In the words of Inspiration we must read our lessons day by day.
